Screenwriter: Diomedes Raul Bermudez, Shiloh Fernandez, Jimmy Giannopoulos

Synopsis: Gio brings a cake to a memorial celebration for the 10th anniversary of his father's mysterious death, hosted by his uncle (Val Kilmer), a Brooklyn mafia boss. His life begins to change as he pieces together what really happened to his father.
Title: The Birthday Cake
